metadata.synopsis: Nimble is a devout and loyal follower of Wulbren (and a bit of a lickarse). He's dedicated to the ironhand gnomes but does not give a crap about anyone else. He is imprisoned in moonrise towers in these lines/fighting his way out/fleeing by boat.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Go to moonrise prison - he's in the cell with wulbren.

1.speaker: Nimble
1.text: Wulbren is the one you want, not I.

2.speaker: Nimble
2.text: Gods, go stand in the corner or something - it'd be more useful.
2.context: NodeContext: tense and annoyed - player has interrupted her in the middle of something

3.speaker: Nimble
3.text: See if you can speed this up, will you? The longer we're stuck here, the greater the risk.
3.context: NodeContext: tense and annoyed - just wants to leave. Very aware she's in danger

4.speaker: Nimble
4.text: You know what doesn't help when you're frantically trying to untie a boat? Being bothered.
4.context: NodeContext: tense and annoyed - player has interrupted her in the middle of something

5.speaker: Nimble
5.text: Whatever Wulbren says? Do it. He's the only one who can get us out of here.

6.speaker: Nimble
6.text: That boat looks damn shaky - it had better hold us.
6.context: NodeContext: tense and annoyed - just wants to leave. Very aware she's in danger
